title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.4 - Price of materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.4 - Price of materials

State Regulations

Emergency materials, supplies and equipment purchased in
the name of the State from a vendor shall be bought at prices not in excess of
that vendor's prices effective in the territory of the local director
immediately prior to attack. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
506.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
